A

AudioLoadHandler - Class in basalt.player
Class which loads sources based on provided identifiers asynchronously.
AudioLoadHandler(server) - Constructor for class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Constructs an AudioLoadHandler from a class BasaltServer instance.
audioPlayer - Variable in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
A Lavaplayer AudioPlayer instance.
AudioSender - Class in basalt.server
Sender class which takes in Opus frames from Lavaplayer and passes them to Magma, where they are then subsequently sent to Discord.
AudioSender(player) - Constructor for class basalt.server.AudioSender
Constructs an AudioSender instance from an AudioPlayer.
AudioTrackUtil - Class in basalt.util
The utility class which converts AudioTracks to easily-transportable data and vice versa.
AudioTrackUtil(server) - Constructor for class basalt.util.AudioTrackUtil
Constructs a new AudioTrackUtil class with an attached class BasaltServer.

B

basalt - package basalt
Package containing the Main Class, which is essentially used simply to start the application up and to add a shutdown hook ensuring Basalt properly shuts down.
basalt.player - package basalt.player
Package containing everything related to Audio Players or the loading of audio.
basalt.server - package basalt.server
Package containing everything related to the Basalt Server, such as the listener that listens for incoming events as well as the BasaltServer class itself.
basalt.util - package basalt.util
Package containing a single AudioTrackUtil class, used entirely to encode/decode tracks.
BasaltPlayer - Class in basalt.player
A player class associated with a class SocketContext and a Guild ID, with a "lifecycle" determined by incoming requests.
BasaltPlayer(context, guildId, audioPlayer) - Constructor for class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Constructs a BasaltPlayer based on a provided class SocketContext, a Guild ID and an AudioPlayer.
BasaltServer - Class in basalt.server
Server instance which is the starting point for every other part of Basalt.
BasaltServer() - Constructor for class basalt.server.BasaltServer
Server instance which is the starting point for every other part of Basalt.
BasaltServerKt - Class in basalt.server
 

C

canProvide() - Method in class basalt.server.AudioSender
Grabs possibly-null provided data from the AudioPlayer instance, sets it and returns whether it's null or not.
channel - Variable in class basalt.player.SocketContext
An Undertow WebSocketChannel.
context - Variable in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
The

D

data - Variable in class basalt.server.AudioSender
The latest AudioFrame of data to be sent.

F

fromAudioTrack(track) - Method in class basalt.util.AudioTrackUtil
Converts a not-null AudioTrack into its data representation, which is then used for various purposes.
future - Variable in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
A CompletableFuture that can be completed with a class LoadResult.

The Lavaplayer SourceManager used to actually load sources.

an array of TrackPairs
getTrackUtil$module() - Method in class basalt.server.BasaltServer

The User ID associated with the WebSocketChannel.
guildId - Variable in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
The ID of the Guild that audio is sent to.

I

isOpus() - Method in class basalt.server.AudioSender
Returns whether or not this send handler provides Opus-encoded data, which is automatically, and constantly, true as Lavaplayer already converts the data.
isUsed - Variable in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
An AtomicBoolean that atomically checks to see if this instance has already been used before.

L

listener - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The class WebSocketListener which every open WebSocketChannel uses to handle incoming requests.
load(identifier) - Method in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Loads a source based on a given identifier, returning a CompletionStage that is used internally for various purposes.
loadFailed(exception) - Method in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Called by Lavaplayer whenever an error occurs while loading a source, completing the result.
LoadResult - Class in basalt.player
A result class which represents a singular, successful load result.
LoadResult(playlistInfo, tracks, result) - Constructor for class basalt.player.LoadResult
Constructs a LoadResult from possibly-null playlist info, a track array and a enum ResultStatus.

M

magma - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The raw MagmaApi instance used to actually send and update voice data/state.
main(args) - Static method in class basalt.MainKt
Main entry point into Basalt, which deploys a class BasaltServer Verticle and adds a shutdown hook.
MainKt - Class in basalt
 
mapper - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The Jackson Object Mapper used to parse the YAML Configuration File.

N

noMatches() - Method in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Called by Lavaplayer if no matches could be associated with the provided identifier, completing the result.

O

onClose(webSocketChannel, channel) - Method in class basalt.server.WebSocketListener
Fired by Undertow when the WebSocket Connection between Basalt and a client closes.
onError(channel, error) - Method in class basalt.server.WebSocketListener
Fired by Undertow upon an error that was thrown during WebSocket Communication.
onFullTextMessage(channel, message) - Method in class basalt.server.WebSocketListener
Fired by Undertow upon a full text message (such as JSON Data) being sent by a client.
onPlayerPause(player) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when the AudioPlayer is paused.
onPlayerResume(player) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when the AudioPlayer is resumed.
onTrackEnd(player, track, endReason) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when an AudioTrack ends.
onTrackException(player, track, exception) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when an exception was thrown during playback of an AudioTrack.
onTrackStart(player, track) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when an AudioTrack starts.
onTrackStuck(player, track, thresholdMs) - Method in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
Fired by Lavaplayer when the track that was playing got stuck.

P

password - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The password used to successfully open a WebSocket Connection to this BasaltServer instance.
player - Variable in class basalt.server.AudioSender
A Lavaplayer AudioPlayer instance.
playlistInfo - Variable in class basalt.player.LoadResult
nullable
playlistLoaded(playlist) - Method in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Called by Lavaplayer whenever a playlist of tracks (including search results) is loaded successfully, completing the result.
provide20MsAudio() - Method in class basalt.server.AudioSender
Returns the raw array of bytes, representing 20 milliseconds of audio data, as set by the AudioSender.canProvide method.

R

result - Variable in class basalt.player.LoadResult
a
ResultStatus - Enum in basalt.player
Enum which corresponds to how a source loaded.

A
setMagma$module(p) - Method in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The raw MagmaApi instance used to actually send and update voice data/state.
setSourceManager$module(p) - Method in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The Lavaplayer SourceManager used to actually load sources.
socket - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The Undertow WebSocket instance.
SocketContext - Class in basalt.player
Context class which stores a reference to a class BasaltServer, a WebSocketChannel and the User ID associated with that channel, as well as a PlayerMap and a Sequence Number of Sent, Successful Events.
SocketContext(server, channel, userId) - Constructor for class basalt.player.SocketContext
Constructs a SocketContext from a class BasaltServer, a WebSocketChannel and a User ID String.
SocketContextKt - Class in basalt.player
 
sourceManager - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
The Lavaplayer SourceManager used to actually load sources.
start(startFuture) - Method in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
Called by Vert.x when this Verticle is deployed (which it is in the Main class).
stop() - Method in class basalt.server.BasaltServer
Called when the Verticle is stopped, which Basalt doesn't do normally except in the shutdown hook.

T

threadPool - Variable in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
The Java ScheduledExecutorService used to schedule the PLAYER_UPDATE task.
toAudioTrack(data) - Method in class basalt.util.AudioTrackUtil
Converts a not-null data representation of an AudioTrack into an AudioTrack, which is then used for various purposes.
trackLoaded(track) - Method in class basalt.player.AudioLoadHandler
Called by Lavaplayer whenever a single track is loaded successfully, completing the result.
tracks - Variable in class basalt.player.LoadResult
an array of TrackPairs
trackUtil - Variable in class basalt.server.BasaltServer

U

updateTask - Variable in class basalt.player.BasaltPlayer
The actual update task itself that is eventually cancelled.
userId - Variable in class basalt.player.SocketContext
The User ID associated with the WebSocketChannel.

W

WebSocketListener - Class in basalt.server
The listener class which responds to WebSocket Events, including (but not limited to) incoming messages.
WebSocketListener(server) - Constructor for class basalt.server.WebSocketListener
Constructs a WebSocketListener from a class BasaltServer instance.
